repnme.cdata!:
Malawi - Third Structural Adjustment
            Operation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The credits would support the
            Government's structural adjustment program. The program
            is designed to encourage productivity and efficiency,
            diversify the export base and promote exports, strengthen
            the Government's policy making capability, and improve
            the performance of development institutions. The foreign
            exchange provided by this credit would be used for essential
            imports. The Government will use the counterpart funds for
            development purposes.
